name: nodejs-waku
description: NodeJs wrapper of a Waku node

scripts.prepare-package: mkdir dist && npm run clean && npm run compile && node dist/SetupPackage.js && cp src/distributed_readme.md dist/README.md
scripts.build-libwaku: cd src/vendor/nwaku && yes Y | make libwaku && cp build/libwaku.so ../../../dist/
scripts.build-gyp: node-gyp configure --directory=src/ && node-gyp build --directory=src/ && cp -r src/build/ dist/
